Pre-Game Insights: Seth Johnson makes his major league debut for the Philadelphia Phillies.
Max Meyer struggles with a 7.94 ERA and 1.42 WHIP in his last start.
The Phillies are sixth in the majors in runs scored and lead by Alec Bohm, Bryce Harper, and Kyle Schwarber.
The Marlins are 29th in the majors in runs scored and lead by Jake Burger and Jesus Sanchez.
The Phillies have hit.333 against Max Meyer in 12 career at-bats.
